page.title: 10HOUSING IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: Villages in N.Yorkshire are regarded as extremely desirable areas in which to live, consequently houses fetch a high price when they are sold-a 5 year-old 4 bedroomed detached house with an average sized garden would fetch about Â£75 000. In the village itself there are 63 owner-occupied houses, 1 rented house and 7 holiday cottages. In the area studied there are 18 farms but only 2 of these have the farmhouses in the village itself. There is 1 mansion which is open to the public. The 63 houses are : 40 detached,20 semi-detached and 3 terrace. There is also 1 mansion(Sutton Hall),1 pub,1 garage and 1 Post Office & shop. Some properties have workshops on their land as businesses are worked from home.
